reviews.review: I have play dots 1 and dota2
Pos va menos de una año de jugar este juego y ya tengo masa de 100o oras  :v
love this game once you learn to play it then it gets really addicting
EEHHHHH you have to pay to recall. but hey, you can get skins for a donkey, I mean...
Quite a large learning curve, but once you get the basics down it's a really enjoyable game!
mejor juego por muchas cosas jugabilidad estreteguias y vivisa
Destroyed my life. Still worth it

This game is a piece of shit. League of Legends is better. Because in League, the camera follows you without having hold space. There is obviosly other reasons, but there are too many to count. Don't download this game, it is not even fun!
Fun game to play with your friends

The controls are absolutley horrid. Can't even change them to WASD which is THE MOST STANDARD SETUP IN EXISTANCE! I left a match once and it's making me play with bad people who can't win, did I mention that you have to win in order to remove the penalty? No? Well you do...
(edit) By WASD I'm talking about hero movement.

después de 3 años siguiendo jugando, puedo decir que este juego es casi para todo, mas que nada ya que tiene modalidades de juego para jugadores casuales y para veteranos, una cosa mala es que si vas al competitivo te encontraras a gente que insulta y gente que juega de otra cuenta y lo sube perjudicando a los demás jugadores.
Los heroes por otro lado tienes que encontrar su maña para poder entenderles, algunos son buenos por la actualización y otros malo igual por su actualización pero en si te dan todos los heroes para poder practicarlo sin problemas.
Buen juego pero mala su calibración de emparejamiento en clasificatorio
le doy 8.5/10.
sigue sigue siendo un juego que le voy a dedicar tiempo ya que le invertí dinero para que se vea bonito los heroes pero en si pero no pagas para tener ventaja es bueno.
:3
this game has changed my life
I play this game not just because i`m having fun of it but also i`m best at it
Pro tip: the only way to play this game is by muting the chat... super toxic people, I'm looking at you Russians and Latinos
nerd game,omg , sooooooo baaadd, get laid , virgins. haahhahahahha , looool
After a while you get used to it...
İm playing this game over 5 year and seriously its the best strategy game i ve evet seeen. İ strongly recommend this game
What a great game to play!!
The best of the best, guess who? A: DOTA2!
it's shit, but I like it
This game is extremely boring and I honestly can't see why anyone is interested in this at all.

Unbalanced as fuck! every match you will enter will include at least one of many wonderful over powered characters from its roster. Will it be the unstopable Ursa and his stacking critical hit buff, Legion commander and his infinate damage stack or maybe the undying lich king that will bombard you will attacks your whole team will be required to fend off and once dead he will billy may your ass and the onslaught will begin all over again. 

If you want to play and honest RTS game, walk away now. If you want to be a mainstream god tier shit lord download this game, select your avatar of fuckery from the unchanging minority off bullshit characters and proceed to MLP your way to obesity, diabetes and unwavering chastity within the confines of your sweat box of a room.

1/10 god is dead

Это дота, что ещё сказать

P.S. Гейб выучи цифру "3"
Игра я бы не сказал что блещет оригинальностью, но очень затягивает.

Gran juego.
Lo único que me emputa es que tarde tanto en encontrar partida.

There's more toxic players and the game still works terribly. Heroes that should be buffed are nerfed and the other way around. Towers are useless and so is the base. Ganking is easy and since no one knows how to play the game it just brings up more how bad the games been designed.

Отличная игра с позитивными ребятами, которая дает расслабится, и подзарядиться позитивом, который исходит из кадого уголка этой прекрасной игры, я считаю эта игра достойна вашего внимания, и не оставит вас равнодушными))
Опа-ча, мёртвая игра 3.0?? пойду картошки поем блядб, а ну да её же делал габен! мёртвая уже три года!
